name: Albert And The Moon
description:
Controls: Arrow keys for rotating left and right and Space Key to go up!

You play as the monkey in the peanut 5000 suit called Albert the Third! He is going to the moon. Enjoy these seven levels we created, it was for a bootcamp we were in. The levels were designed to have no help to the player as to where to go, but if you need help, don’t hesitate to comment and we’ll help you on where to go. 

Other than that,

Enjoy!

- Enderlinq & Magicalthingy
